content: the simple shells cowl is a beginner-friendly one-skein cowl project it will be available for free on my blog on 11/5/2020 at https //kickincrochet com/simple-shells-cowl 1 and it is also available for purchase as a pdf here the pattern includes written instructions and a video tutorial video also goes live 11/5/2020 as this pattern uses just one skein of berroco folio yarn it is not a very large cowl however instructions are included for adjusting the size in case you would like to make it larger laid flat it measures approximately 7 5 tall and 9 5 wide but stretches and fits easily over my adult large head 22 5 1 https //kickincrochet com/simple-shells-cowl
